meanings.definition: A bar attached to the rear of a vehicle for towing purposes.
meanings.sent1: The towbar on the back of the truck helped pull the broken car.
meanings.sent2: The towbar is essential for towing trailers safely.
meanings.sent3: When the towbar and the car became friends, they always went on adventures together.
meanings.sent4: The towbar was like a loyal companion, always ready to lend a helping hand.
meanings.sent5: The shiny towbar gleamed in the sunlight, ready for any towing task.
